home.title: Welcome to Rust Cameroon
home.subtitle: Building a vibrant, inclusive, and passionate Rust community right here in Cameroon. Whether you're a seasoned Rustacean or just starting your journey, you're in the right place.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're dedicated to fostering a strong Rust community in Cameroon by organizing meetups, workshops, and educational events. Our goal is to make Rust accessible to everyone, from beginners to experts.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Connect with fellow Rust enthusiasts, share knowledge, and collaborate on exciting projects. Together, we're building the future of systems programming in Cameroon.

about.title: About Rust Cameroon
about.subtitle: We're building a vibrant, inclusive, and passionate Rust community right here in Cameroon.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to promote the use of Rust, foster collaboration, and empower developers through learning and sharing. We believe that Rust's memory safety, performance, and developer experience make it an excellent choice for building reliable software systems.
mission.additional: Through meetups, workshops, and events, we aim to connect Rust enthusiasts, share knowledge, and build amazing projects together. Whether you're interested in systems programming, web development, embedded systems, or blockchain, Rust has something to offer.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the leading Rust community in Central Africa, known for our technical excellence, inclusive culture, and innovative projects that solve real-world problems using Rust.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.content: We welcome developers of all skill levels, backgrounds, and experiences. Everyone has something valuable to contribute to our community.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.content: We believe in the power of continuous learning and knowledge sharing. Our community thrives on mutual support and collaborative learning.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We encourage innovative thinking and creative problem-solving using Rust's unique features and capabilities.

join.title: Join Us
join.content: Ready to be part of something amazing? Join our community today and start your Rust journey with us. Whether you're a complete beginner or an experienced developer, there's a place for you in Rust Cameroon.

events.title: Events
events.subtitle: Join our upcoming events and connect with the Rust community in Cameroon
events.noEvents: No events scheduled at the moment. Check back soon!

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Latest insights, tutorials, and news from the Rust community
blog.noPosts: No posts available at the moment.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this post?

footer.description: Building a vibrant, inclusive, and passionate Rust community in Cameroon. Join us as we explore the possibilities Rust offers and build amazing projects together.
